original_text: And the priest shall take the shoulder of the ram, when it is boiled, and one unleavened loaf out of the basket and one unleavened wafer, and shall put them on the hands of the Nazirite, after he has shaved the hair of his consecration,
korean_text: 자기의 몸을 구별한 나실인이 그의 머리 털을 민 후에 제사장이 삶은 숫양의 어깨와 광주리 가운데 무교병 하나와 무교전병 하나를 취하여 나실인의 두 손에 두고

sentences.original_text: And the priest shall take the shoulder of the ram
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 제사장은 숫양의 어깨를 가져올 것이라

sentences.original_text: and one unleavened loaf out of the basket
and shall put them on the hands of the Nazirite
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그것들을 나실인의 손에 올려놓을 것이며

sentences.original_text: after he has shaved the hair of his consecration
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 자신의 구별된 머리털을 깎은 후에
